description:
It's time to fit in like a tangram master! Turn, flip, and drag shapes together to solve the puzzle and reveal a doodle.

A tangram is a Chinese logic puzzle in which you must fit seven pieces into a target shape without any overlapping.

Enjoy solving over 200 deceptively simple puzzles in Tangrams Deluxe!

● Beautiful Presentation.
● Intuitive Controls.
● A doodle for each puzzle.
● 200+ Puzzles!
name: Tangrams Deluxe
